text: yeung ban dak b nhnh tde towleu puokke( yeahou ti) nowknong kompir ( ta v rt)noh pitabrakd nasa chivit sang daoy chivit phnek sang daoy phnek chramouh sang daoy chramouh the m nh sang daoy the mnh haey rbuosa snam ka trauv sang vinh der . dau che neah anaknea haey ban anoukroh champoh ke( chonolmeusa) ku anak noh trauv ban ke( a l laoh)loubleang tosa aoy ke . haey anaknea del min katsechakdei tam avei del a l laoh ban banhchouh mk te noh anak teangnoh kuchea puok del bampean
